histogram.name: SBClientDownload.CheckDownloadStats
histogram.summary: Records a histogram of the reason why downloads are marked as being malicious or clean by the improved SafeBrowsing binary download protection. Note that UNSUPPORTED_URL_SCHEME was split out of the INVALID_URL bucket in M41. The NOT_BINARY_FILE check was moved before the UNSUPPORTED_URL_SCHEME check in M42. The WHITELISTED_URL check was moved to before NOT_BINARY_FILE in M62.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.CheckWhitelistResult
histogram.summary: For each download supported by the SafeBrowsing download protection service, records if it matches a certain whitelist (e.g. matches URL whitelist, matches signature whitelist, or does not match any whitelists).

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DeepScanTrigger
histogram.summary: Records the reason each file was uploaded to Safe Browsing for deep scanning. This is logged on every deep scan.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DmgFileSuccessByType
histogram.summary: Counts of DMG-like file types that were successfully analyzed by the SafeBrowsing download service.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DownloadExtensions
histogram.summary: Records a histogram of how often users download a file with a file extension that is possibly dangerous (e.g., exe, class).

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DownloadFileHasDmgSignature
histogram.summary: A Mac-only metric that records whether a given download file is a cryptographically signed DMG archive. This metric is logged before Chrome sends SafeBrowsing download pings.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DownloadRequestDuration
histogram.summary: Records the total time it takes for the SafeBrowsing download service to check whether the content of a download is malicious or not, including file feature extraction, whitelist checking, and server ping. This histogram only includes checks that sent a ping to the SafeBrowsing server. It does not include requests that were cancelled, but does include requests that received a bad response.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DownloadRequestNetError
histogram.summary: The net error code for all CheckClientDownloadRequest URLFetchers.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DownloadRequestNetworkDuration
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes for the SafeBrowsing download service ping. It is not recorded for requests that were cancelled.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DownloadRequestNetworkStats
histogram.summary: Records the results of SafeBrowsing binary download checks which caused a server ping.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DownloadRequestPayloadSize
histogram.summary: The size of the upload data for CheckClientDownloadRequest URLFetchers.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.DownloadRequestResponseCode
histogram.summary: For CheckClientDownloadRequest URLFetchers with successful status, the HTTP response code that was received.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.ExtractDmgFeaturesTimeMedium
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes for the SafeBrowsing download service to extract info from a downloaded DMG file.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.ExtractRarFeaturesTimeMedium
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes for the SafeBrowsing download service to extract info from a downloaded rar file.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.ExtractZipFeaturesTimeMedium
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes for the SafeBrowsing download service to extract info from a downloaded zip file.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.MalwareDeepScanResult.{trigger}
histogram.summary: Records the result of a malware deep scan, split by the reason the file was uploaded for scanning. This is logged only for succesful scans. The overall rate of successful scans is logged in SafeBrowsingBinaryUploadRequest.MalwareResult.

histogram.name: SBClientDownload.ZipFileSuccess
histogram.summary: For each zip file analyzed by the SafeBrowsing download service, records if the unpacking was 100% successful.

histogram.name: SBClientMalware.IPBlacklistRequestNetError
histogram.obsolete: Removed in 09-2020 since the SBClientMalware feature was removed.
histogram.summary: The net error code for all ClientMalwareRequest URLFetchers.

histogram.name: SBClientMalware.IPBlacklistRequestPayloadSize
histogram.obsolete: Removed in 09-2020 since the SBClientMalware feature was removed.
histogram.summary: The size of the upload data for ClientMalwareRequest URLFetchers.

histogram.name: SBClientMalware.IPBlacklistRequestResponseCode
histogram.obsolete: Removed in 09-2020 since the SBClientMalware feature was removed.
histogram.summary: For ClientMalwareRequest URLFetchers with successful status, the HTTP response code that was received.

histogram.name: SBClientMalware.SentReports
histogram.obsolete: Removed in 09-2020 since the SBClientMalware feature was removed.
histogram.summary: Measures the success rate of sending malware reports. Sending a report can fail due to a client reaching the limit on the number of reports it can send per day or due to the report failing to be serialized.

histogram.name: SBClientMalware.ServerDeterminesMalware
histogram.obsolete: Removed in 09-2020 since the SBClientMalware feature was removed.
histogram.summary: The counts for malware verdicts given by server side model.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.CacheDetectsPhishing
histogram.summary: When a result is served from cache, this histogram records whether the result was phishing or not.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.CancelClassificationReason
histogram.summary: The counts for various reasons why an in-progress phishing classification was canceled.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.ClassificationStart
histogram.summary: The number of pages that we could have possibly classified (essentially the number of top page navigations by users with SBClientPhishing enabled). The name is slightly misleading as it is recorded before "Preclassification" happens.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.Classifier.Event
histogram.summary: Records events in the phishing classifier including reasons that prevents phishing detection to complete on the renderer side.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.ClassifierNotReadyReason
histogram.summary: Records the result of the last model fetch. This is only recorded when classification fails because the model is not ready. This is useful for distinguishing different reasons the model may not be ready (never fetched, fetch failed, etc.)

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.ClientModelDownloadResponseOrErrorCode
histogram.summary: Response or error codes from the SafeBrowsing service. Logged after a request for the client side model finishes to capture the response code or the error code for that HTTP request.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.ClientModelStatus
histogram.summary: The counts for various model status codes that we get after loading a new client-side phishing model.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.ClientModelVersionFetched
histogram.summary: Records the version of the local phishing detection model fetched. This histogram is logged each time we load a model.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.DOMFeatureChunkTime
histogram.summary: The time that an individual chunk of DOM feature extraction work took.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.DOMFeatureFrameRemoved
histogram.obsolete: Removed 01-29-2021 due to lack of use.
histogram.summary: The number of times that DOM feature extraction finished early because the active WebDocument's frame was removed during traversal.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.DOMFeatureIterations
histogram.summary: The number of iterations that the DOM feature extractor took to finish.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.DOMFeatureResumeTime
histogram.summary: The time that it took to resume DOM feature extraction for the phishing classifier. Longer times may indicate that the page DOM changed between chunks of work and the extractor had to re-traverse up to the saved position.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.DOMFeatureTimeout
histogram.summary: The number of phishing classifications that were aborted because DOM feature extraction took too long.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.DOMFeatureTotalTime
histogram.summary: The time that the DOM feature extarctor took to finish, summed across all chunks of work.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.IllegalFeatureValue
histogram.obsolete: Removed 01-29-2021 due to lack of use.
histogram.summary: The number of features which were omitted from phishing classification because they were added with an illegal value. This would indicate a bug.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.LocalModelDetectsPhishing
histogram.summary: Records whether the local phishing detection model detects phishing. This histogram is logged each time the model is run (roughly on every navigation to a non-allowlisted site)

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.PageCapturedMatchesBrowserURL
histogram.obsolete: Removed 01-29-2021 due to lack of use.
histogram.summary: This records whether a page capture event matches the last URL requested from the browser process. This histogram is recorded on every page capture event.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.PhishingDetectionDuration
histogram.summary: Records the duration it takes for client side phishing detection to finish.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.PhishingDetectorResult
histogram.summary: The result enum received from the renderer-side classifier

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.PreClassificationCheckResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of phishing pre-classification checks. This is recorded on every classification attempt (roughly every page load).

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.ReportLimitSkipped
histogram.obsolete: Removed 01-29-2021 due to lack of use.
histogram.summary: The number of phishing classifications that were previously cached as being phishing but that will get re-classified (to possibly fix false positives).

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.RequestNotSerialized
histogram.obsolete: Removed 01-29-2021 due to lack of use.
histogram.summary: The number of phishing classifier pingbacks that were skipped because serializing the request protocol buffer to string failed.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.RequestSatisfiedFromCache
histogram.summary: The number of times that a cached phishing classification result was used, rather than pinging the server.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.ScorerCreationStatus
histogram.summary: Records the status when we create a scorer object for the client-side phishing detection classifier.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.ServerModelDetectsPhishing
histogram.summary: Records whether the server-side phishing detection model detects phishing. This histogram is logged each time we contact Safe Browsing to evaluate whether a site is phishing.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.TermFeatureBreakIterError
histogram.obsolete: Removed 01-29-2021 due to lack of use.
histogram.summary: The number of phishing classifications that were aborted because the term feature extractor failed to initialize an ICU break iterator.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.TermFeatureChunkTime
histogram.summary: The time that an individual chunk of term feature extraction work took.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.TermFeatureIterations
histogram.summary: The number of iterations that the term feature extractor took to finish.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.TermFeatureTimeout
histogram.summary: The number of phishing classification that were aborted because term feature extraction took too long.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.TermFeatureTotalTime
histogram.summary: The time that the term feature extarctor took to finish, summed across all chunks of work.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.TooManyFeatures
histogram.obsolete: Removed 01-29-2021 due to lack of use.
histogram.summary: The number of times that the limit on the number of phishing classifier features for a page was reached. This may indicate a bug, or that kMaxFeatureSize is too small.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.URLFeatureTime
histogram.summary: The time taken to extract URL features for the phishing classifier.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.VisualComparisonTime
histogram.summary: Records how long it took to compare visual features against the visual phishing model. This is recorded on every phishing classification.

histogram.name: SBClientPhishing.VisualFeatureTime
histogram.summary: Records how long it took to extract visual features. This is recorded on every phishing classification.
